content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: "Very well, thank you for considering my apartment. I would like to start with a proposal of 800 Euros per month. This price reflects the excellent location of the apartment and its modern amenities. What do you think? Do you have any counter-offers you would like to make?"
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your proposal. I understand that the location is very desirable, but I'm not sure if I can afford that price. Can you consider lowering the rental price?"
name: James Smith

content: "I understand your concerns, but the location of the apartment is a significant factor in determining its value. However, I am willing to consider a lower rental price. How about 700 Euros per month? This still reflects the excellent location and modern amenities of the apartment while also being more affordable for you."
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
That sounds like a more reasonable price. I would like to accept your proposal of 700 Euros per month."

"Excellent, thank you for your decision. The apartment will be available for move-in on June 1st. You will receive a lease agreement shortly after your deposit is paid. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact me. Have a great day!"
name: James Smith

content: "Thank you for your help, Mister Heine. I look forward to moving into the apartment and enjoying its many benefits. Goodbye!"
name: Heinrich Heine
